snippet.title: Sorelle - Official Trailer | USC Games Expo
snippet.description: Immerse yourself in Sorelle's magical seaside town of Isola Chiara in this whimsical puzzle-platformer. Swap between three sisters Alessandra, Bella, and Capri, and combine their unique powers to solve puzzles and restore the town. Explore the magic of sisterhood and use your newfound powers to save the summer festival. Sorelle is coming to PC.
